name: Cube Quest
description:
IMPORTANT: If you play the game in your browser, I recommend to set fullscreen to avoid lose focus and hook properly the mouse.

RECOMENDED: The downloadable versions can run better performance and  better shadows and qualitty  settings, so I recommend to play by downloading the game.

Dive into a short adventure full of chests treasures and madness!

This game is a project to evoke a certain feeling in the player by using only cubes without textures. What did you felt during the gameplay? Please let me know in the comments in order to know if I really didi a good job or not, this will be very very helpfull.

All credits belong to me, HackBeam. All assets, including music, sounds and models are made by me using only free software.
